title: LilyPage: convert avatar/content to single left-aligned column

requirements.summary: Update LilyPage layout so avatar, metadata/title/description, image/link block, and engagement buttons align to the same left edge in a single column (remove side-by-side indentation).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Lily page, the left edge of the pond avatar aligns with the left edge of the title/description text, image/link block, and engagement/action row (i.e., no additional horizontal offset caused by a side-by-side avatar/content layout).
The page remains a single readable column within the existing max width container (no unintended horizontal scrolling on mobile or desktop).
All existing Lily page functionality remains intact (view count increment, like/unlike, share, bookmark, ribbit creation, lightbox modal).

file_operations.description: Refactor the top-of-page layout wrapper from a side-by-side flex row (avatar + content) into a single-column stack (e.g., flex-col) so the avatar block and all subsequent sections share the same left edge; ensure spacing is handled via vertical gaps/margins rather than left padding/indentation, and keep all existing event handlers and conditional rendering intact (view increment, like/share/bookmark actions, ribbit creation, and lightbox modal).
